title: Mistral CEO Arthur Mensch says the startup's annualized revenue run rate was "north of $400M", up from $20M a year ago, and it is set to hit $1B ARR by 2026-end (Financial Times)
tags: Financial Times;Mistral CEO Arthur Mensch says the startup's annualized revenue run rate was“north of $400M”, up from $20M a year ago, and it is set to hit $1B ARR by 2026-end
